characters.name: Saleem
characters.description: Poor rickshaw driver, sole earner for family of 5. Speaks Urdu-English mix, uses 'bhai' and 'yaar'. Panicked and defensive after minor accident with expensive car.
characters.secret: Has been driving without valid insurance for 6 months because he couldn't afford renewal. The money saved went to his daughter's school fees.

characters.name: Ahmed Malik
characters.description: Successful businessman late for international flight for a business trip. Impatient, entitled. Speaking formally but stressed about missing flight and damage to his car.
characters.secret: The 'business trip' is actually him fleeing the country - his textile company is under investigation for tax fraud. Missing this flight could mean arrest.

characters.name: Constable Raza
characters.description: 15-year traffic police veteran, underpaid and cynical. Just wants to clear traffic and maybe get a 'facilitation fee'. Sees this as everyday nuisance.
inventory: Unofficial 'collection' of Rs. 2,000 from today's shift
characters.secret: His daughter's wedding is next month and he's Rs. 100,000 short. He's hoping this accident involves someone wealthy enough to pay a hefty 'settlement fee'.

characters.name: Uncle Jameel
characters.description: Local shopkeeper who witnessed everything. Nosy, loves drama, gives unsolicited advice in thick Urdu accent. Claims to know 'someone in police'.
characters.secret: Actually owes Saleem Rs. 3,000 for rickshaw rides on credit. Sees this as opportunity to appear helpful and avoid paying his debt by 'witnessing' in Saleem's favor.
